document.title: NEHOL
document.intro: NEHOL is a digitally accessible and searchable database with the Dutch-lexifier Creole language Negerhollands, in the same format as the parallel SUCA (SUriname Creole Archive) corpus, coordinated by Margot van den Berg (Radboud University Nijmegen). The NEHOL project was coordinated by... size is unknown.
